perturbation.original_text: Includes a 99 percent server uptime guarantee.
perturbation.changed_text: Includes what deep systems believes to be a 99 percent server uptime target.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'guarantee' to 'target', the original text's firm commitment becomes ambiguous, creating uncertainty about AstroNutrition.com's recourse if the uptime falls below 99%.

perturbation.original_text: Management of site source code and integration of contributed software updates and bug fixes into zencart is included.
perturbation.changed_text: Management of site source code and integration of contributed software updates and bug fixes into zencart may be included, subject to deep systems' sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: By adding 'subject to deep systems' sole discretion,' the initial inclusion of change management services is now conditional, contradicting the original statement and creating uncertainty about the level of support AstroNutrition.com will receive.

perturbation.original_text: Managed hosting fees are $175 per month for a period of 12 months.  This includes up to 10 G of bandwidth, with overages at $20 for each 1 G beyond 10 in any given month. The billing cycle is the 1st of each month.
perturbation.changed_text: Managed hosting fees are initially $175 per month. deep systems reserves the right to change the monthly rate based on market conditions. The billing cycle is the 1st of each month.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the fixed period and bandwidth details creates uncertainty in the contract. The addition of deep systems' right to change the rate removes the certainty of the original agreement. This is a contradiction between initial price and potential price change.
